contents.text: Welcome to Code Nation in San Francisco, providing students in under-resourced high schools with the skills and connections needed for careers in technology.
To learn about our student coding programs and course offerings, press 1.
To hear details about our curriculum and classroom experiences, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with our curriculum team.

navigationGoals: I need a concise breakdown of your student coding curriculum and classroom activities.
I want to review your coding curriculum to see if it can help me transition into a tech career.
I want to connect with the curriculum team to discuss code modules, learning outcomes, and instructional design.
I want help understanding what topics and classroom experiences your student coding programs cover.
Learn about the coding program’s curriculum, classroom methods, and sample projects.

contents.text: To find out how your school can enroll students in our programs, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with our enrollment support staff.

navigationGoals: I want to enroll my high school in your coding program and need the steps to get started.
I need to find out how to enroll participants from my veteran reintegration program in your courses.
I want to connect with enrollment support to set up student registration, prerequisites, and LMS integration.
I need guidance on how a high school can enroll its students in your coding programs.
Ask how my school can sign up for the coding program.

contents.text: To explore partnership opportunities and ways to support Code Nation, press 2.
To discuss corporate partnership and sponsorship opportunities, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with our partnerships team.

navigationGoals: I’m interested in discussing corporate sponsorship opportunities with Code Nation.
I'm interested in corporate sponsorship opportunities for Code Nation through my organization.
I want to connect with the partnerships team to explore corporate sponsorship packages, hackathon sponsorship, and CSR alignment.
I'm looking into corporate sponsorship options and want to discuss partnership opportunities.
Inquire about corporate partnership or sponsorship opportunities.

contents.text: To learn about volunteer and mentoring opportunities, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you with our volunteer coordinator.

navigationGoals: I’d like to volunteer as a coding mentor and learn how to get involved.
I want to volunteer as a coding mentor for students in under-resourced schools.
I want to connect with the volunteer coordinator to discuss pro bono tech mentorship, curriculum coaching, and volunteer onboarding.
I'd like information on how I can volunteer and mentor students in your programs.
Find out how to volunteer or mentor with Code Nation.
